name: Brass Armageddon
description:
Brass Armageddon is a top-down shooter in which you try to clear all procedurally generated room before the time runs out and the world ends. If this ever happens, you travel back in time to a pocket dimension in which you can buy upgrades to try again.

Music: Toaster_stroodle

Map_assets: Toaster_stroodle

Enemy_sprites: Emperor Palpatine

Developers: CreeperODeath, Emperor Palpy

Sound sfx: Chiptone
